snippet: In Detroit’s downtown and midtown neighborhoods, which have occupancy rates of at least 96 percent, the city has been struggling to meet a growing demand for an urban lifestyle.
abstract: Surge in interest in Detroit’s downtown and midtown neighborhoods, which have occupancy rates of at least 96 percent, has the city struggling to meet growing demand for an urban lifestyle.
lead_paragraph: In Detroit’s downtown and midtown neighborhoods, which have occupancy rates of at least 96 percent, the city has been struggling to meet a growing demand for an urban lifestyle.

headline.seo: New Thirst for Urban Living in Detroit Leaves Few Rentals
headline.main: New Thirst for Urban Living, and Few Detroit Rentals
headline.print_headline: New Thirst for Urban Living, And Too Few Detroit Rentals
